channel.title: [pay] Need some help[Pay]
channel.description:
Hello everyone! ,
i have some idea's and i don't exactly know how to do them.
finally i finished my rsps.
but i still need something:
1) I have paypal , i want to do some thing like that : when you type into game ::voting immediately go to papypal and ready for transfer a some cash to my paypal account ... and when he pay he'll must to type ::check into game , and if it succeed the transfer he'll get member tick ! ...... and the member tick when he wear it he'll became a donor. ___________________________________________ Please i need HELP , Skype : killlove92 Email : ibrahemhatem@gmail.com ___________________________________________ 1) how mach you pay ? answer : you'll offer to me.

item.title: [pay] Need some help[Pay]
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

Are you trying to say that you want to make a ::donate command that opens up a new browser to your paypal? and after they donate you make them a donator?

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“donate”)) {
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“YOUR PAYPAL LINK”, 12000);
c.sendMessage(“Thanks for donating”);

}[/code]

Read full topic

item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

UHM??? WTF? Please explain this using proper grammar and no rewards are allowed.
